Good morning!
It\'s a bit chilly outside, better prepare some warm clothes!
Hey! The sun\'s out. Better catch up!
It\'s hot today! Remember to drink a lot of water.
Weather for today:
You are not sleeping enough!\nTry try one of these tips:\n

Stick to a consistent sleep schedule, even on weekends.
Limit caffeine intake.
Establish a relaxing bedtime routine.
Turn off electronics an hour before bed.
Create a sleep-conducive environment.
You are sleeping too much!\nTry one of these tips:\n

Try to maintain a regular sleep schedule.
Limit napping during the day.
Avoid caffeine and alcohol before bedtime.\Engage in regular physical activity.
Talk to a doctor about any underlying medical conditions.
You are sleeping well enough.
It\'s too bright to have a good quality sleep.
The lux value in the room is optimal for a good quality sleep.
Humidity is too high to have a good quality sleep.
Humidity in the room is optimal for a good quality sleep.
Room temperature is too high to have a good quality sleep.
Temperature in the room is optimal for a good quality sleep.
Sensor is not working or it needs to update
